## C7084 Big Data and Decision Making

![](img/C7084-slide.png){fig-alt="C7084 title slide" fig-align="center" width="400"}

Welcome to C7084. This module is a survey of aspects of applications and tools to to store, access and analyse "big data". There is an emphasis on practical applications using a series of **data stories** and **lab exercises**, along with **lectures** on selected topics and **readings**. A prerequisite is a basic working knowledge of Python programming and familiarity with cloud environments.
